website_summaries.verdict: This junior kip bar is built for gymnasts 75 lbs. and lighter, but you can purchase a separate extension kit that brings the limit up to 125 lbs.
pros: Steel frame construction with powder coated finish
Height adjusts from 38 to 56 inches with specially designed spring pin knobs
Great for practicing basics and for indoor play
cons: Extension kit needed to use above 75 lb
Over time, motion may strip the screw holes that hold the bar in place

customer_reviews.title: This bar was recommended by a friend who had thoroughly researched bars and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the stability of a bar at home. My kids range in age from 4-10 and have different levels of gymnastics skill. This bar was recommended by a friend who had thoroughly researched bars and also purchased it for her 3 kids. It is great. It gets used all the time and has proven sturdy and stable. I am a grown adult and have also used it and found it to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: My kids love their Jr. Kip Bar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Jr Kip Bar for my 6 and 4 year old. The 6 year old is heading into level 3 and our 4 year old will hopefully start classes this Spring. They both love this bar. The part for the bar shipped promptly, arrived on time, and was exactly what I ordered per the specifications online. The Kip Bar was easy to assemble; we had no issues with set up. The bar feels study and safe. Even my husband and I tried it out a time or two. :) I also purchased the mat per Tumbl Trak's Customer Service recommendation and it fit perfectly. We love the Jr. Kip Bar!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Finnerty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6yr old
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 6 yr old gymnast. She loves it! We’ve had it for months now. It’s very sturdy (and we do not have the “stabilizer bar”). There is a non-slip mat under the mat which I would say is absolutely needed. Some pieces I purchased straight from tumbl track depending on price/shipping of items.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any age!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my four-year-old daughter who is in gymnastics. It does wonders for her letting out some energy and she has gotten so much better at her ability on the bar. It is sturdy very well-made. I like that it is adjustable to multiple different heights and you can put an extender on for additional support as she becomes older. The only reason I gave it four stars is because I wish it had more soft material around the bar itself but it is very true to what you would see in a gym.
customer_reviews.author: AWest

customer_reviews.title: Few annoyances: wrong wrench included, frustration-full packaging
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality seems decent, but a few annoying bits: They sent a 5mm wrench, but that size is too large for their hardware, so I had to fight through my junk drawer in order to set it up. Also, WOW did they over tape and over tighten the bubble wrap on the pieces. I love how well it was protected, but hated that I spent 20 minutes carefully trying to cut tape and not also cut the paint. Good intentions, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: dleon

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for “Homenastics!” It’s a great way for my daughter to practice her gymnastics training at home during the COVID-19 pandemic. It helps her burn off excess energy. It also keeps her active and not glued to the couch watching tv or playing in electronics all day. It’s sturdy and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for young gymnasts!
customer_reviews.text: This bar is great for young gymnasts! It is very sturdy and easily adjusts to different heights. It was fairly easy to assemble and I was impressed with the quality. Overall, it is bigger than I expected which is a good thing so my kids will be able to use it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: We have this with some rings hanging from the ceiling and its all we need for a good party.
customer_reviews.text: We have this is in our basement for when we have kid parties. Kids go nuts over it (ages 4 to 8). We have this with some rings hanging from the ceiling and its all we need for a good party.
customer_reviews.author: Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it and so far it seems sturdy. There was minor damage during shipping (small dent ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and so far it seems sturdy. There was minor damage during shipping (small dent in wood bar, 2 broken plastic caps, a few scuffs off paint). Very easy to assemble. I would have liked it more if the price was lower.
customer_reviews.author: dan gibson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for my Level 3 daughter. It's on the backporch and she is on it every single day. Very solid and well made. I did attach some wooden extensions to make it even more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Good way to start!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get my daughter some gymnastics equipment that wouldn't break the bank, yet of quality. The Tembl Trak brand is the way to go. This is a great size bar to learn the basics & even then some. Stable & secure!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Santa nailed it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a small 8 year old and we're not having any problem with it rocking with a mat. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bar for my niece for her birthday. It arrived in wonderful condition despite seeing that some people have gotten them without the hardware recently. It went together great and my niece loves it. It even breaks down easily for storage in her bedroom. It works well without the extensions but we will know more as she grows with it. Overall, great product and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well built and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this kip bar set for our now 8-year old daughter for Christmas last year, and it has held up quite well despite 6 months of regular use. The adjustable height is a nice feature. There is limited wobble despite my daughter spinning on the bar fairly aggressively. The central bar portion is wooden, but the finish is smooth and there is no concern for splinters. Overall, we are quite happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DTM15

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 2 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this every single day. She's 2 years old and has NOT been to gymnastics (yet), she has been practicing on this bar for about 6 months. We purchased a 2" mat to help with falls. I wish I had gone with a 4" mat, and probably will upgrade to one later on this year. (Although it's not necessary. My daughter has not hurt herself at all.) It was a little expensive, but definitely worth every penny. Additionally, we had our 11 year old neice come over and raised the bar for her. She had no problems flipping around and had a blast with it. This bar will be used for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, sturdy and made well!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been begging for an in house bar for some time! Santa made it happen this year and she was all smiles. She is on it every single day. Very sturdy made very well! She is 8 and about 88 pounds and this is the perfect fit for her! Will add a photo tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M. Rabideau

customer_reviews.title: but if you have a good sized playroom
customer_reviews.text: Durable and well made. Wish I had paid extra for the more advanced model, which folds down for easier storage when your gymnast is not using it. This is quite large, but if you have a good sized playroom, so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to give this to my daughter for her birthday. However, when I opened the box I discovered all three of the support beams were missing. Now I have to go through the hassle of returning the item, not to mention I have a disappointed little birthday girl.
customer_reviews.author: Hockeymama24

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.  Nice bar
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is less than 60 lb but I still feel like we needed more stabilizing on the bottom. Other than that the bar is very nice and my child improved her skills quickly on it. We did have a defective piece when receiving with product. Tumbl Trak customer service was very helpful to resolve our issue in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Kip Bar for our daughter (age 9) and she absolutely LOVES it. She is working on her hip circles and mill circles and this has been wonderful. The product came to us without issue, was easy to assemble, and everything still seems extremely well made. We have used Tumbl Trak products before for cheerleading and have had great experience. We will keep seeking out their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Powell

customer_reviews.title: Even like that, it was wobbly
customer_reviews.text: We got the bar with the extensions. Even like that, it was wobbly. Then got a 2x4, still wobbly. Then got 4 big bags of sand for each corner. Still wobbly. Overall the bar is good and the kids play on it a lot but not anything fancy. If you can screw it to the ground, might give more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Fotiosha

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Goes together easy. Very solid. All in all a quality product that helps to tire my very energetic daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Snowman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Much sturdier than I thought it would be. A bit more difficult to assemble too. But overall very pleased! I’m 140 pounds and can do simple moves without feeling like the bar is going to snap.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Practice Bar for the next Olympics
customer_reviews.text: Strong, sturdy, adjustable, colorful and steady. It's a great addition to our basement. Having the mats to go under it make it a perfect fit for every little child that likes to practice their gymnastics stunts or just mess around like an Olympian.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Eckert

customer_reviews.title: and her coaches report a great improvement from May to August on her bar routine
customer_reviews.text: This is used daily by my daughter who is a level four. We bought it at the beginning of the summer, and her coaches report a great improvement from May to August on her bar routine.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie L. Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the extenders. Easy to put together. Very sturdy for my 80lb gymnast. I can’t hardly get her off of it! It’s her favorite!!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble, and extremely sturdy. Bought for my 9 year old, but all my kids love it and use it frequently. Everyone loves it, including friends and cousins when visiting!
customer_reviews.author: Colt.m

customer_reviews.title: Love it and would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my beginner. She can do pull-overs, casts and back hip circles without the bar moving. When I need to take it down it’s easy to assemble and disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: momof5

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Jr Kip Bar
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this junior kip bar for our 8 year old daughter and it was delivered and performs as advertised. Very easy to assemble and appears to be built very solid. My only complaint is that it is very wobbly for the kips. Works well for other advanced skills but I'm going to need to purchase the leg extensions and possibly sandbags for her to be able to practice her kips. This problem wouldn't be unique to this kip bar though, so overall, I'm pleased with the purchase and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: but it takes a terrible beating with no wear
customer_reviews.text: My 4 grandkids have not broken it, but it takes a terrible beating with no wear.
customer_reviews.author: skip3house

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the quality of this bar.... absolutely perfect! My only issue is it sliding around on our basement floor while the kids are doing tricks.bought the extension kit also
customer_reviews.author: Missy k

customer_reviews.title: Now she has pullover skillz!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughter and she promptly developed enough strength and skill to do a gymnastic pullover. This is a sturdy product. We are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: dcjpro

customer_reviews.title: best buy for practice
customer_reviews.text: daughter loves this... best buy for practice. She's a small 11 and still using it. I think best suited for ages 8 and under though.
customer_reviews.author: Romero

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for 8 and 4 year olds...they both LOVE it! It was delivered on time and easy to put together. Great quality and overall a great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: it is a great quality bar
customer_reviews.text: I have two daughters 5 and 3, we have been going to gymnastics for years now. I got it for them for Christmas last year (2016) and they still play on it now. I have moved it up only 1 or 2 notches. it is a great quality bar.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Island

customer_reviews.title: I'd rate it a 7.5 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great bar for my budding gymnast. There are only minor safety concerns about sturdiness. I also bought a thick mat and as long as it's properly underneath the bar everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, easy to setup and adjust!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I didn’t spend extra money on the pro! Super sturdy and good enough for my six year to do kips and back front hip circles and presses to handstands and lots more. Will add plywood once I get the mats in mail but this thing is way worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buy Stabilizer bar right away
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nine year old gynnast. It is a great bar and was very easy to set up. I only recommend buying the stabilizer bar which are additional. I would had rated this a 5 if Tumbl Trak sold the Jr Kip Bar and stabilizer bars together not as an option. Once stabilizer bars were added- my daughter had no issues and still practices every day on this.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: granddaugher loves this, learned the trick she needed to do to move up
customer_reviews.author: 67yo grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service! Easy to set up. Really sturdy. Easy to set up additional features. Beware: comes in shipment of two boxes. BOLO for both when you order.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good product; sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Alittle wobbly but it is great.My daughters were so happy christmas day.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Successiscrucial

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 8-9 year old monkeys
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves it. Her 10 year old friend can do all kinds of moves (sorry I'm not well versed) but when she flips all the way around the base does jump a bit. This girl is about 4.2" and 80lbs. My 8 year old can't do that move but otherwise the bar doesn't move at all at full height (which is about at the top of her reach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, really sturdy and works well. Our 7 year old is learning a lot and putting it to the test for the past year.
customer_reviews.author: RQBII

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old daughter loves it! Easy to adjust and has really help her improve her bar skills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She's on it all the time & am very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her bar. She's on it all the time & am very happy with purchase. Deduct one star because wished it was more solid & less wobbly when she does her skills (we do have a 4x4 plywood board on it). She's only 50lbs and on petite size.
customer_reviews.author: Enlighten Me

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I just received it and so far so good. It's perfect for my daughter and seems pretty well built. Hope it last. Took no longer than 15 minutes to build.
customer_reviews.author: Truc Phan

customer_reviews.title: It came right away which was great because it was a Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: It came right away which was great because it was a Christmas present. Set up was quick and easy. My daughter is 5ft and 110lbs and she has no trouble using. I was afraid it would be too flimsy but it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes mistakes happen
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with all pieces. Had to return... now I have extensions with no bar 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad delivery
customer_reviews.text: All the screws are missing!!!! The pieces come in separatte dates...are you going to send me the screws??? I couldn’t give the present to my god daughter on her bday and she can play now because of the missin screws!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Lyra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old absolutely loves it. Easy to assemble, and seems really sturdy. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: normanps

customer_reviews.title: Great for your tumbling princess or queen!
customer_reviews.text: Great for your tumbling princess or queen! My brothers princess is already and expert and will use this all the way in to her teens because of it's adjustability and she loves the pretty color!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to set up!
customer_reviews.text: This item was very hard to set up and I followed the instructions correctly. I had bought this for my daughter for her birthday and she was very disappointed. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ree ree

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice bar, but you need to buy the stabilizer ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice bar, but you need to buy the stabilizer pieces to make it safe to kip and play on it without it rocking
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Swackhamer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for flipping daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old gymnist loves this. Spends hours per day on it. Very sturdy and really happy to have purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy. Perfect for my 7 and 9 nine year ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this bar. It's very sturdy. Perfect for my 7 and 9 nine year old weighing between 55 and 80 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Samanda74

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old loves it!!! Relatively easy to put together! Was an awesome Christmas gift! She's already won 1st place in bars for her work b/c of her using this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget the padding
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8 years old and ~55 pounds, and this product does the job. Just as an FYI, you WILL need some sort of mat or padding for this bar.
customer_reviews.author: cards42leal

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Came without attachment pieces; had to order from directly from manufacturer. Otherwise,great product
customer_reviews.author: jess w

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Easy to assemble and pretty sturdy without the extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seemed a little pricey but my daughter uses it every single day so it was totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bar
customer_reviews.text: This bar is is a very nice home bar. my daughter loves it I would definitely reccomend this bar
customer_reviews.author: bigelliot

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!! Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to assemble and made well. Kids LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Working great for our 6 year old gymnast. The bar is very sturdy and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: so far so good. except the main part where they hold on ...
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. except the main part where they hold on to amd put their belly on to flip over is wood. and it started to scratch and irritate my daughters belly. so just tried to use sandpaper to make it smooth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Able to practice at home now with no distractions. It is adjustable to whatever height or level that we want it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Chaisson

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect addition to our gymnastics equipment. My daughter has been on it since it arrived. This will help her grow stronger and continue working to achieve new goals with her bar routine.
customer_reviews.author: LMattia

customer_reviews.title: Would’ve been a great product if you sent the right screws to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve been a great product if you sent the right screws to put it together. Sadly, we cannot surprise our daughter tomorrow for her birthday 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hufana

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is adjustable and she can still use ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is In gymnastics and she gets to practice at home. It helps her to improve on her moves. I like that it is adjustable and she can still use it even when she gets older. She is 5yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Cecily M Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my 6 year old just learning gymnastics. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If your child can do very much on the bar at all you need the extensions!
customer_reviews.author: ADS

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I teach tumbling and it is an extra feature my students love to play on. thanks for the great customer service
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids LOVE it. make sure to get the extensions with this, it definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: James Thib

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage poor threading, D-2 knobs won't go in. Whole thing is unstable. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bar...very sturdy for our 6 yr old granddaughter. Was very easy to put together also..
customer_reviews.author: jovette hebert

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 9 and two 6 year olds. They use it quite a bit, made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to set up and everything we've expected so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it! Was easy to set up and everything we've expected so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Young

customer_reviews.title: My older child (11) makes it rock back and forth ...
customer_reviews.text: My older child (11) makes it rock back and forth so I will need to get extensions to help it be more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Schmitty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good bar. It's sturdy. Packaged well and no defects. Very easy to assemble. Comes with Allen wrench which is only tool needed. My son is 8 and weighs 70 lbs. First year of gymnastics but he does back hip circles, mill circles, dismounts, hand stands, pullovers. Did buy extensions for extra stability.
customer_reviews.author: mykl67

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a hit in our home and really easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!! My 5 year old has improved tremendously in just 1 month
customer_reviews.author: Tomass P - TPX4

customer_reviews.title: When I received this item, I only received three ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item, I only received three pieces to the base, there was not even a bar included.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Ann Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and all their friends love this bar! Easy to assemble and very durable! Don't let kids use it with buttons on their pants (as with any bar-it would scratch it).
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha G.

customer_reviews.title: The D-2 Knobs came with the package don't fit the ...
customer_reviews.text: The D-2 Knobs came with the package don't fit the bar, so I am not able to assemble it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: love it easy to move and so glad we went with adjustable you can go from doing kips to handstands just adjusting the bar its quick and easy
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and perfect for what we needed. My daughter is 7 years old an weighs 60 pounds. She does kip, back hip circles, cast, front hip circles, mill circles, and cast to a stand on bar to jump off. About anything needed for Level 2, 3 and 4 gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: Cissy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kids busy!!
customer_reviews.text: Although we had to screw down boards and a mat to stabilize it, my girls, ages 12, 9, and 3 LOVE this bar!!! And so do all their friends!!
customer_reviews.author: henley hallmark

customer_reviews.title: Unsteady even for small children
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I'm pretty disappointed in this bar. My daughter is about 42" and 42 lbs and the whole thing shakes even if she does a simple pullover or back hip circle. She's actually nervous about trying certain moves on it because she knows it's going to be unsteady. And she's ONLY 42 POUNDS!! I don't think there are too many kids smaller than this using this bar!! My husband recently purchased those add-on stabilizers but they don't really help that much. I gave it 3 stars because she loves it and uses it often, but I wish it was a lot more steady.
customer_reviews.author: ELF

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, same brand our gym uses
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, same brand our gym uses, we needed the extensions for our level 3 daughter. She is a smaller 7 year old, so I think it was the skills she was working on that required more stablility as opposed to size of the gymnast. So glad we got this!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints from the gymnast in the house
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with Amazon's delivery as the product should come in 2 boxes, Amazon kept sending out only 1 so I ended up purchasing it directly from Tumbl Trak. As is, the bars are a little unstable but useable for my daughter who is about 40lbs but we went and purchased some 4x4 3/4" MDF and placed it on the supports. We used the 4x4 MDFs as it was easier to manage than a 4x8 plywood and it provides better support being heavier.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: My daughter ways 52#'s and is an 8 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ways 52#'s and is an 8 year old. She can not do her kips on this bar without having it move all over. It is NOT stable. I'm going to order the extensions but I'm skeptical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great product...my 5 and 7 year old girls love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn W

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this product does not come with the mat or the extra pad as shown in all of the pictures. This should have been explicitly stated in the description. Also, it is not well supported. My daughter who is 50 pounds, was doing a back hip circle and the entire bar rocked back and forth. It needs much more stabilization to be used safely. Other than that, its an okay product, you just need to know what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: SeaMama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, going on a month and a half and ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, going on a month and a half and they work great. My Strong 6 yrs old can most of the time turn the knobs to switch the hieghts on her own. We love them. A little expensive, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kip bar as a present for my daughter who is on a gymnastic team. It works well for basic practice. You need extensions to so more complicated skills so it won't feel like it is moving.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett W. Gee

customer_reviews.title: My girls love this bar
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this bar. They said the bar is a little more flimsy in the middle than the one they use at gymnastics but it works for at home practice. We did have to buy the extension kit because it is not stable enough without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up & move if needed
customer_reviews.text: kids are enjoying, easy to set up & move if needed, my oldest daughter can adjust easily as well, best to buy extenders if you have a bigger kids, bars can rock when dismounting.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit in our home! Believe it or not, my daughter is 11 and still enjoys her bar immensely! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just received the bar and my kids are so excited. Unfortunately it Came with no directions or instructions. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Super easy to build with one tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Super easy to build with one tool. I built it myself in minutes. Super sturdy! My daughter is 9 and she is completely safe using this. It is super easy to make higher or lower. Right now it is in my unused living room which is now the gymnastic room. I got the extra stabilizer bars and it is worth the extra $75. It does keep it from lifting. I did not put the plywood yet bc she is very light. All I have a mat. So far so good. She uses it everyday. Great product and brand.
customer_reviews.author: I.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Not hard to put together. 6 year old loves it and was her favorite gift. Can handle all types of multiple movements on the bar without slightest risk of tipping over. Bar is wood so some chalk will be needed for hands.
customer_reviews.author: David Wall

product_meta.title: Tumbl Trak Expandable Gymnastics Training Jr Kip Bar
product_meta.description: Our Jr. Kip Bar is a gymnastics training bar for kids just beginning their athletic career. A perfect kip bar for home use, it features a 1-½ inch diameter solid maple wood bar and offers a good amount of stability for beginner to intermediate level skills. With optional stabilizers kids can easily perform skills like kips and back hip circles on the Jr. Kip Bar. The kip bar’s base can be even further stabilized with a 4ft x 8ft piece of plywood for more advanced skills.
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR DESIGN - The Tumbl Trak Junior Kip Bar’s design makes it both safe and effective for your young athlete. Rounded corners, flat steel bait ensure that your athlete will be safe and confident when training.

HIGH QUALITY - Steel construction with a smooth powder coated finish will keep your bar looking like new and functional for years. A 1-1/2in solid wood bar is tough enough to withstand the most rigorous training while providing a gym-like feel.

SIMPLE SET-UP/ADJUSTMENT - Designed to be very easy to move up and down. The bar adjusts from 38in - 56in high with our specially designed spring pin knobs. This bar is also easy to assemble, allowing for it to be set up and taken down as needed.

OPTIONAL EXTENSIONS - Is your athlete growing up and getting bigger and stronger? The optional base extensions increase the bars maximum stability weight from 75lbs all the way up to 125lbs and are super easy to install.

WE KNOW GYMNASTICS - When you purchase a product from Tumbl Trak, you know that you’re getting a TRUE gymnastics product. Coaches, former gymnasts, and industry experts make up the our staff ensuring you get the best product for your athlete.

Weight limit of 125 lbs. is a "working" load which is how your athlete will use it (swinging, circling, hanging, kipping). Be wary of competitors who list a high weight limit that is indicative of static load (hanging only) and not working load.
